channel.title: Blogs on Hugo Serif Theme

item.title: blog 1
item.description: Are you thinking about a job switch? Are you rummaging through job portals and earmarking newspapers? Dear reader, you are going about it all wrong. You need to look at a smarter way of keeping track of open positions in organizations that you aspire to work in. In November 2020 claimed that the average amount of time to find a job is 24 weeks. Thatâ€™s a lot of time, and it must be well spent on searching for the right job, not sifting through endless web pages with sub-par filtering capabilities.
